text: Sunny Day Real Estate is an American rock band from Seattle, Washington. Sunny Day Real Estate formed in 1992 when they were originally called Empty Set. They broke up in 1995 because Goldsmith and Mendel were leaving to join Dave Grohl's band, the Foo Fighters. They reunited in 1997 and disbanded again in 2001. They reunited once again in 2009. == Discography== === Albums === * Diary (1994) * Sunny Day Real Estate (1995) * How It Feels to Be Something On (1998) * The Rising Tide (2000) == Other websites == *Sunny Day Real Estate's Official website Category:American rock bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from Seattle Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Washington (state) Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1995 Category:1995 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2001 Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Washington (state) Category:1990s disestablishments in Washington (state) Category:2000s disestablishments in Washington (state)
title: Sunny Day Real Estate
